Uses of Class
oracle.ucp.UniversalConnectionPoolLifeCycleState

Packages that use UniversalConnectionPoolLifeCycleState
oracle.ucp Includes both required and optional callback interfaces that are used to implement connection pool features. 
oracle.ucp.admin Defines interfaces for administering Universal Connection Pool instances, including JMX support. 
 

Uses of UniversalConnectionPoolLifeCycleState in oracle.ucp
 

Fields in oracle.ucp declared as UniversalConnectionPoolLifeCycleState
static UniversalConnectionPoolLifeCycleState UniversalConnectionPoolLifeCycleState.LIFE_CYCLE_FAILED
          Connection pool has failed.
static UniversalConnectionPoolLifeCycleState UniversalConnectionPoolLifeCycleState.LIFE_CYCLE_RUNNING
          Connection pool is started and can hand out connections.
static UniversalConnectionPoolLifeCycleState UniversalConnectionPoolLifeCycleState.LIFE_CYCLE_STARTING
          Connection pool is starting up.
static UniversalConnectionPoolLifeCycleState UniversalConnectionPoolLifeCycleState.LIFE_CYCLE_STOPPED
          Connection pool is stopped.
static UniversalConnectionPoolLifeCycleState UniversalConnectionPoolLifeCycleState.LIFE_CYCLE_STOPPING
          Connection pool is stopping.
 

Methods in oracle.ucp that return UniversalConnectionPoolLifeCycleState
 UniversalConnectionPoolLifeCycleState UniversalConnectionPool.getLifeCycleState()
          Gets the life cycle state of the connection pool.
 

Uses of UniversalConnectionPoolLifeCycleState in oracle.ucp.admin
 

Methods in oracle.ucp.admin that return UniversalConnectionPoolLifeCycleState

          Gets the life cycle state of the Universal Connection Pool.
 UniversalConnectionPoolLifeCycleState UniversalConnectionPoolMBean.getLifeCycleState()
          Gets the lifecycle state of Universal Connection Pool instance.
